tr.td: When a file matching the pathname for the shared object exists already
Attempting a file operation failed because of insufficient space
Compiler detected an out of bounds index operation
Internal system error; may indicate LLVM error
Received a system interrupt indicating an immediate exit
Compiler has detected a shape mismatch but not a rank error
A system limitation has been encountered
Unimplemented feature reserved for future use
Compiler has detected a rank error of an argument
Compiler has encountered a line that is not a meaningful statement
The compiler has found a reference to an unbound variable or a function call returning no result where one was expected
The compiler has run out of memory
Indicates a successful execution of the compiler and the return of a semantically equivalent namespace
